Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This unique item carries a significant value of $10000 to me, reflecting its exceptional quality, craftsmanship, and the time invested in its creation. I am confident it could bring immense value to your collection or endeavors. Considering its intrinsic worth and the opportunity it presents, I kindly invite you to consider purchasing this product at the same price of $10000. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of sharing this remarkable piece with you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $10,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $10,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
